text: Goodbye Bafana is a 2007 drama movie. It is about the life of Nelson Mandela when he was in prison. It stars Dennis Haysbert, Joseph Fiennes and Diane Kruger. It was released in Germany on February 11, 2007 at the Berlinale. ==Plot== The young revolutionary and anti-apartheid activist Nelson Mandela is arrested, and it is the job of censor and guard James Gregory to watch him. During his work in the prison of Robben Island, Gregory slowly begins to dislike the apartheid politics and the racism of white South Africans he is part of. ==Cast== * Joseph Fiennes as James Gregory * Dennis Haysbert as Nelson Mandela * Diane Kruger as Gloria Gregory * Norman Anstey as Jimmy Kruger * Faith Ndukwana as Winnie Mandela * Terry Pheto as Zindzi Mandela * Zikhona Mda as Zenani Mandela * Leslie Mongezi as Walter Sisulu * Zingizile Mtuzula as Raymond Mhlaba * Mehboob Bawa as Ahmed Kathrada * Shakes Myeko as Andrew Mlangeni * Sizwe Msutu as Cyril Ramaphosa ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2007 drama movies Category:2000s biographical movies Category:2000s prison movies Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies about Apartheid Category:Movies about Nelson Mandela Category:Prison drama movies Category:German biographical movies Category:German drama movies Category:French biographical movies Category:French drama movies Category:Belgian biographical movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:South African biographical movies Category:South African drama movies Category:Italian biographical movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Luxembourgian biographical movies Category:Luxembourgian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Bille August
